members.description: After adding members, they can share your membership benefits. Ideal for family, business, and multi-user scenarios.

delegate.title: Payer Management
delegate.description: Manage users who pay for your account
delegate.noDelegate: You currently have no payer, you are using your own membership benefits
delegate.info: Someone is currently paying for your account. You can use their membership benefits.
delegate.rejectWarning: After rejecting the payer relationship, you will lose the membership benefits provided by this user and will need to pay yourself or find another payer.

rejectSuccess.title: Rejection successful
rejectSuccess.description: You have successfully rejected the payer relationship

migrated.title: Task System Migrated
migrated.description: Asynchronous tasks are now managed through the Asynqmon monitoring dashboard. You can view task queues, execution status, and history in Asynqmon. Email send logs can be viewed on the EDM send logs page.
